trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANMAM118_05278_SEQ_00<tab>Kageel Ja needs you to procure medicinal ingredients.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANMAM118_05278_SEQ_01<tab>Deliver the requested materials to Kageel Ja.

TEXT_BANMAM118_05278_TODO_00<tab><var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Mine <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> near Cenote Neyozzote)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Kageel Ja)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Gather <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> near Cenote Neyozzote)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Kageel Ja)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Catch <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var> at Bitterbark Cenote)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to Kageel Ja)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANMAM118_05278_KAGEELJA_100_001<tab>In recent days, we've had a steady drip of locals returning to Mamook from Tuliyollal and across the salt.

TEXT_BANMAM118_05278_KAGEELJA_100_002<tab>The former mercenaries among them have been eager to take up posts as gainery guards, but even the best suffer minor wounds during their tussles with encroaching wildlife. In order to treat these injuries and ailments, I'd like to keep a good stock of healing medicines on hand.
TEXT_BANMAM118_05278_KAGEELJA_100_003<tab>Yak T'el moss is always a useful ingredient. I would appreciate whatever you can bring me from the vicinity of Cenote Neyozzote.
TEXT_BANMAM118_05278_KAGEELJA_100_004<tab>Ja Tiika cranberries are always a useful ingredient. I would appreciate whatever you can bring me from the vicinity of Cenote Neyozzote.

TEXT_BANMAM118_05278_KAGEELJA_100_005<tab>Cexudross fish are always a useful ingredient. I would appreciate whatever you can catch from Bitterbark Cenote. As always, golden stonefly nymphs will serve you well.
TEXT_BANMAM118_05278_KAGEELJA_100_006<tab>If you have the time, we could use a few clumps of Yak T'el moss from the vicinity of Cenote Neyozzote.
TEXT_BANMAM118_05278_KAGEELJA_100_007<tab>If you have the time, we could use some Ja Tiika cranberries from the vicinity of Cenote Neyozzote.
TEXT_BANMAM118_05278_KAGEELJA_100_008<tab>If you have the time, we could use a Cexudross fish or two from Bitterbark Cenote. As always, golden stonefly nymphs will serve you well.
TEXT_BANMAM118_05278_KAGEELJA_100_009<tab>Hello, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Did you find the ingredients we're looking for?
TEXT_BANMAM118_05278_KAGEELJA_100_010<tab>Yes, this is exactly what we need. Thank you for going to the trouble─getting to some of these cenotes can be a journey in itself.

TEXT_BANMAM118_05278_KAGEELJA_100_011<tab>It's said that the traditional medicines made from these ingredients are the same as those handed out to soldiers during our war with the Xbr'aal. In those days, it was the duty of those unsuited to battle to gather the necessary materials.
TEXT_BANMAM118_05278_KAGEELJA_100_012<tab>That time has passed, thankfully, but the healing remedies still prove as effective as ever. I may call on you again if our stock of ingredients runs low.
